name: Lore Systems
tag_list: hosting, network, architecture, design, cloud-computing, data-center, information-technology, managed-services, international-business, delivery-center
overview:
An information technology services company specializing in cloud computing, data center and cloud computing solutions, Lore Systems offers complete and managed IT services out of its corporate headquarters in the Washington, DC metropolitan area.

The close-to-20-year technology firm provides customers with managed hosting, virtual private and cloud computing private server; support in network, technical and desktop management ; and network architecture and design.

Lore’s international reach includes delivery centers in the US states of Virginia and California and in Belgium.

Its more than 300 clients include federal agencies and state governments, Fortune 500 companies, not-for-profit organizations, trade unions, small and medium-sized businesses, and more.
